basics.name: Justine Ponce
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineer at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in 2025.

highlights: Handled customer complaints with respect and resolution
Anticipate and promptly respond to customers' needs
Produced estimates and explanations to customers of their vehicle needs
Provided customer satisfaction with insights and knowledge of their vehicles
Carefully unload and stock merchandise with minimal to no damage
Provided friendly and quick response to customers over the phone
Marketed special offers and sales to customers in Mainland and Hawaii
Provided quick resolution and satisfied customer complaints

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Eugene F Marchal Endowed Scholarship
awards.summary: The purpose of this fund is to provide scholarship assistance to students enrolled at the University of Hawai'i at Manoa College of Engineering. Funds shall be used for costs associated with attendance (e.g. tuition, books, fees, etc.).
